   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Biosim_Project's documentation!
==========================================

This is a simulation of animals of two species with
 * a modifiable island
 * two species:
  * Carnivores
  * Herbivores
 * customizable parameters for island biomes and animals

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   island
   landscape
   animals
   simulation
